name: Drunken Fist
description:
Drunken fist! - This is funny game about fighting, in a drunken style. Busty knockouts, drunken physics, and secret tricks. Lawlessness, live camera and more fun!

You play as a drunk man who needs to get home. Along the way, you fight with various enemies - hooligans, cops, punks, etc. All enemies have their own tricks.

Physics and control absolutely accurately convey the feeling of a drunken brawl - the blows fly past, you constantly fall and behave ridiculously. There are many punches and tricks available. You can even urinate so your opponent slips!

The camera in the game simulates live shooting, so it looks like a video about fighting drunks on YouTube.
